snippet: Israeli Defense Forces officials were caught off guard by the online outcry over a disciplinary case.
abstract: Thousands of soldiers express solidarity on Facebook with David Adamov, Israeli soldier who was filmed having aggressive confrontation with Palestinian teenagers and later put in jail; later is it revealed that Adamov was jailed not because of the confrontation, but for having previously attacked two of his own commanders.

byline.contributor: Myra Noveck and Gabby Sobelman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Israeli Defense Forces officials were caught off guard by the online outcry over a disciplinary case.

headline.main: Israeli Military Officials Caught Off Guard by a ‘Digital Rebellion’
headline.print_headline: Israeli Military Officials Caught Off Guard by a ‘Digital Rebellion’
